io.leonis.zosma.ipc.peripheral

Interface ControllerDeducer<C extends Controller,A extends Identity,I extends Controller.MappingSupplier<C,A>,O>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - The type of controller.
    A - The type of entity which is being controlled by this deducer.
    I - The mapping of controllers to their corresponding entities.
    O - The type of output which is generated by this deducer.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Deducer<I,O>, java.util.function.Function<org.reactivestreams.Publisher<I>,org.reactivestreams.Publisher<O>>

    public interface ControllerDeducer<C extends Controller,A extends Identity,I extends Controller.MappingSupplier<C,A>,O>
extends Deducer<I,O>
    The Interface ControllerDeducer. This interface describes the functionality of a Deducer which transforms mappings from controllers to entities to the state of the controller as interpreted by the corresponding ControllerHandler.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.leonis.zosma.game.engine.Deducer

        Deducer.Identity<I>, Deducer.Tap<I>
